price: Basi msujudieni Mwenyezi Mungu, na mumuabudu.
footnotes: Basi msujudieni Mwenyezi Mungu aliye iteremsha Qur'ani kuwa ni uwongofu kwa watu wote, na muabuduni Yeye tu peke yake Mwenye kutukuka kwa utukufu wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
